title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo element, it does not take focus anymore. However, if the combo list is dropped down, it will take focus.
EB: The Combo should take focus when clicked on, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software
2. Locate the first Combo element
3. Click on the first Combo element
